message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $14000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'd be happy to purchase it for $13000.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a price of 13500. Let me know if that works for you.
